attributes.action: Provide affordable housing for personnel leaving the Army, RAF, Navy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current housing market, military personnel are being left behind on the housing ladder. after 22yrs of service+ we are left with no more advantage even though we if married are paying rent for years. I ask for a scheme to assist military personnel to buy council houses at a reduced rate considering the yeras of rent or are given a incentive
